name: 賴明鈞
objective:
1. 介紹不同負荷型態的機械元件的電腦輔助分析方法
2. 介紹電腦輔助機構運動分析的方法
3. 有限元素模型建立與範例
schedule:
1. Introduction to Computer-Aided Engineering Analysis
2. Programming with Matlab
3. Programming with Matlab
4. Programming with Matlab
5. Advanced Plotting and Model Building
6. Advanced Plotting and Model Building
7. Analysis of Axially Loaded Systems
8. Analysis of Torsionally Loaded Systems
9. Analysis of Statically Indeterminate Systems
10.Analysis of Statically Indeterminate Systems
11.Analysis of Beams
12.Kinematic Analysis of Mechanisms
13.Kinematic Analysis of Mechanisms
14.Kinematic Analysis of Mechanisms
15.Finite Element Modelling and Examples
16.Finite Element Modelling and Examples
17.Finite Element Modelling and Examples
18.期末考
scorePolicy:
出席與課堂表現 佔10%
作業成績  佔55%
期末考  佔35%
materials:
1. 教科書：W. J. Palm III, “Introduction to Matlab 7 for Engineers,”2005, McGraw-Hill
2. 上課講義
